mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERBOARD( UB_HEAD,UB_TITLE,UB_CONTENT, UB_REGDATE, UB_CNT) VALUES(#{ub_head}, #{ub_title}, #{ub_content},now(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT USERBOARD.*,USER.NAME FROM USERBOARD INNER JOIN USER ON USERBOARD.ID = USER.ID WHERE UB_ID = #{ub_id}

SELECT * FROM USERBOARD
${searchCondition} LIKE '%${searchKeyword}%'
AND DATE(UB_REGDATE) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
ORDER BY UB_ID DESC
